comments: Tillman (MEM) establishes himself in Hunter's (ATL) path and does not deliver illegal contact as he sets the pick on the perimeter.
Capela (ATL) brings his hands toward Bane's (MEM) path and marginal contact occurs with Bane's front at the end of the drive.
Hunter (ATL) slightly extends forward as he establishes himself in Tillman's (MEM) path and marginal contact occurs simultaneously with the defensive switch as the pick is set.
Jackson Jr. (MEM) blocks the shot attempt prior to when the ball reaches its apex.
Brooks (MEM) initiates contact across Collins' (ATL) right arm after Collins' gather.
Hunter (ATL) briefly has his arms around Tillman's (MEM) midsection and quickly slides them off as he goes around the pick.
Tillman (MEM) firms up over his left foot and does not deliver illegal contact as he sets the pick on Hunter (ATL).
Capela (ATL) makes clean contact with the ball and dislodges it away from Morant (MEM) prior to incidental contact occurring.
Tillman (MEM) places his arm in a legal vertical position and after absorbing the contact that occurs during Collins's (ATL) layup attempt his arm lower slightly.
Hunter (ATL) raises his arm up to pursue the rebound and incidental contact occurs with Jackson Jr.'s (MEM) right arm as Jackson Jr. gains control of the ball.
Collins (ATL) brushes Jackson Jr.'s (MEM) right arm after making initial contact with the ball and marginal contact occurs after Jackson Jr. secures the rebound.
Hunter (ATL) brushes Jackson Jr.'s (MEM) left arm after making initial contact with the ball and marginal contact occurs prior to Jackson Jr. releasing the pass.
Jackson Jr. (MEM) jumps backward slightly and marginal contact occurs with Capela's (ATL) front as Capela completes the alley-oop.
Capela's (ATL) right forearm comes forward toward Bane's (MEM) front and marginal contact occurs as Bane elevates for the driving shot attempt.
Capela (ATL) cleanly blocks the shot attempt prior to when the ball reaches its apex.
Jones (MEM) brings his left hand toward Young's (ATL) path and marginal contact occurs with Young's front as Young drives inside the perimeter.
Hunter (ATL) commits a take foul on Jones (MEM).
Bane (MEM) engages with Bogdanovic (ATL) during the inbound and marginal contact occurs as Bogdanovic moves to set the screen.
Collins (ATL) brings his hands forward toward Jackson Jr.'s (MEM) back and marginal contact occurs after the release of the shot attempt.
Morant (MEM) and Young (ATL) make incidental body contact with one another as they each pursue the rebound.
Bane (MEM) and Bogdanovic (ATL) engage and disengage with one another during the inbound.
Possession is incorrectly awarded to ATL. Young (ATL) touches the ball last before it goes out of bounds. Possession should have been awarded to MEM.
Bane (MEM) legally contests Bogdanovic's (ATL) jump shot attempt.
Roddy (MEM) engages and disengages with Murray (ATL), and marginal contact occurs after the release of the jump shot attempt.
Murray (ATL) elevates to pursue the rebound and marginal contact occurs with Morant's (MEM) back and head as Morant back-taps the ball.
